CQ1.query: Which customers have support representatives from the same country, and what are the full names of those representatives? Note: Employees assigned to customers are referred to as 'support representatives', responsible for assisting customer needs.

CQ2.query: Which employees have a job title containing 'Manager' and are responsible for supporting customers? Note: Employees assigned to customers are referred to as 'support representatives', responsible for assisting customer needs.

CQ3.query: Which employees and the customers they support have email addresses with the same domain? Note: Employees assigned to customers are referred to as 'support representatives', responsible for assisting customer needs.
